items.sentence: Tom asked Mary who she thought would be the most likely to win the race.
Tom asked the man at the front desk where he could get his suit pressed.
Tom knew he barely had enough time to do everything that had to be done.
I\'ve botched things up so bad I wish I could find a hole to climb into.
I wonder whether or not there\'ll be more snow this year than last year.
I\'d like to move back into the apartment building where I used to live.
I wanted Tom to play chess with me, but he said that he didn\'t want to.
We\'re looking for someone who can take care of these kinds of problems.
Tom can\'t get along on his salary because he has high medical expenses.
Tom doesn\'t need to bring a lunch. I\'ll make something for him to eat.
